rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with minimal decoration and bright lighting to evoke Mediterranean aesthetics.
A spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural light and sea views. Decor incorporates neutral colors with touches of Mediterranean style like terracotta tiles.
A compact yet functional kitchen integrated within the living space; budget-friendly layout using modern fixtures and minimalistic design.
The bedroom is designed as a cozy bachelor pad, with ample storage and built-in wardrobes. A small balcony or window seats are incorporated to enhance the Mediterranean feel.
A dedicated home theater space with soundproofing and ambient lighting; positioned away from bedrooms to reduce noise.
Compact bathroom integrated near the master bedroom for ease of access, with fixtures designed for space efficiency.

openings.details: Floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light; double-glazed for energy efficiency in line with Vastu principles favoring light entry from the east or north.
A large, accessible door ensuring seamless flow of space and adhering to local building norms for safety and accessibility.
